animals: Rabbits, sheep, chinchompas, cows, yaks, salamanders
sources: Unlimited quantities of woad leaves can be purchased from Wyson the gardener in Falador Park.

With high Thieving, pickpocking Master Farmers yield a lot of seeds. Seeds can be bought from Head Farmer Jones in Taverley and Olivia in Draynor Village. Their shop stock replenishes quickly, having a combined total quantity of 183 seeds (15 unique seeds) at a time.
ease: 3000+ seeds per hour with 90+ Thieving and Sticky Fingers alone.

sources: Flies can be purchased from pet shops in Taverley and Yanille.
ease: Only 200 available a day (shared stock) - daily runs required whilst raising frogs.

sources: Raw tuna and raw swordfish can be obtained from Managing Miscellania. Ghotistix can be pickpocketed for raw fish, noted with Thieving cape perk.
Raw rabbit, raw beef and raw bird meat can be obtained from Fresh Meat after completion of As a First Resort.
ease: Limited shop quantities relative to demand (700 in packs and 60 unnoted items per day), especially in the late game as dinosaurs are crucial at higher levels - buying out the shop from early on is strongly advised

sources: Croesus drops 45-55 noted mort myre fungus commonly. Fungal spores can be gathered relatively quickly from Decaying Lumbridge guards using sign of the porter at 88+ Hunter.
ease: ~1000 fungal spores per hour with porters. Slow without 88+ Hunter. Food is not required to breed animals; it merely speeds up the process. Sufficient produce can be obtained without feeding zygomites.

sources: 40 pineapples can be purchased a day from Arhein in Catherby. After completing Easy Karamja achievements (15 agility/40 mining, no quests), 40 pineapples can be claimed a day from Dell Monti. Cooking apples can be purchased from the Culinaromancer's Chest - base stock of 50. 50 apples also sold at Rodney's Independent Trading Co.
ease: Seeds should be used if possible. Fruit is not recommended due to low quantities.
